properties.name: manon.default-user.actuator.username
properties.description: Default actuator-user name. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.actuator.password
properties.description: Default actuator-user password. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.admin.username
properties.description: Default admin-user name. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.admin.password
properties.description: Default admin-user password. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.dev.username
properties.description: Default development-user name. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.default-user.dev.password
properties.description: Default development-user password. This user is created in database if not found during start-up.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.chunk
properties.description: User snapshot batch: user chunk size.

properties.name: manon.batch.user-snapshot.snapshot.max-age
properties.description: User snapshot batch: user snapshot max age in days.

properties.name: manon.performance-recorder.enabled
properties.description: Enable API performance recorder. Should be used in development or test environment only.

properties.name: manon.security.jwt.token-ttl
properties.description: JWT token time to live (in seconds).
